Title: Dragons: Dawn of the Dragon Racers
Genre: Animation, Short, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy
Writer: Cressida Cowell (based upon the "How to Train Your Dragon" book series by), Art Edler Brown, Douglas Sloan
Actors: Jay Baruchel, America Ferrera, Christopher Mintz-Plasse, T.J. Miller
Plot: Dawn of the Dragon Racers, is a short film describing how Dragon Racing was invented. Hiccup and all his friends from the dragon academy fight about who really invented it.
